creator: a.brazhnyk@biconsulting.ws
text:
Note that there is no standard API avaliable at the moment. SUN is working on a 
JAVA Specification Request JSR-105: XML Digital Signature APIs on an API for 
XML Signature and JSR-106: XML Digital Encryption APIs, __BUT UNTIL NO__, 
nothing 
has been published. So, this software does not conform to any of these 
specifications.

should it be "but until now"?
